decision_conditions: Condition 1 of Planning Permission ref no  23/02663/HOU is amended as follows: The following drawing numbers: 2207_P_100 RevB Proposed Location Plan and Block Plan 2207_P_103 - Proposed Ground Floor Plan 2207_P_105 - Proposed Loft Floor Plan 2207_P_104 - Proposed First Floor Plan 2207_P_106 - Proposed Roof Plan 2207_P_107 - Proposed Elevations 2207_P_108 - Proposed Section AA and BB are replaced by:2207_P_200 - Proposed Location Plan and Block Plan 2207_P_203 - Proposed Ground Floor Plan 2207_P_205 - Proposed Loft Floor Plan 2207_P_204 - Proposed First Floor Plan 2207_P_206 - Proposed Roof Plan 2207_P_207 - Proposed Elevations 2207_P_208 - Proposed Section AA and BB
description: Non Material amendment to planning permission 23/02663/HOU (Erection of a single storey rear extension and internal reconfiguration.) to allow additional glazing and additional roof lights to proposed rear extension
